about_the_game:
We’re happy to present our first project-Slavic Dark Fantasy action RPG Chern

Action with RPG elements by the game industry beginners of «GAMEGA Games» studio.

Embark on an exciting journey through the vast locations of a fantasy universe inspired by Slavic mythology. We got inspiration from genres such as metroidvania, soul-like and classic RPGs, while working on the design of the game.

Chern is about unity with nature, fate and ancient gods.


The leveling system is based on the action RPG masterpieces. Wide choice of fighting style unusual perquisites will allow everyone to feel the Chern in their own way.

The combat system.

Combine amulets and artifacts with melee weapons and magic to create a unique build for your own style of the playthrough. Elemental damage and combinations of nature powers in battles will vary the gameplay.

Environment

We have achieved a unique visual style combining 2D and 3D graphics. Russian artist and illustrator Ivan Bilibin inspired our designers to bring the national romantic style of Russian Art Nouveau to the computer screens and give the opportunity to find yourself in a fairy tale. Scary. Hopeless. But still a fairy tale
